mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( member_seq, id, nickname, password, name, birth, email, backup_question, backup_answer ) VALUES ( MEMBER_SEQ.nextval, #{userId}, #{nickname}, #{userPw}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{backupQuestion}, #{backupAnswer} )
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET id = #{userId}, nickname = #{nickname}, password = #{userPw}, name = #{name}, birth = #{birth}, email = #{email}, backup_question = #{backupQuestion}, backup_answer = #{backupAnswer}, point = #{point}, status = #{status} WHERE member_seq = #{mSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT member_seq, id, nickname, password, name, TO_CHAR(birth,'YYYYMMDD'), email, backup_question, backup_answer, point, join_date, status FROM member WHERE member_seq = #{mSeq}

SELECT A.*,B.* FROM ( SELECT t2.rnum as num, t2.member_seq as mSeq, t2.id as userId, t2.nickname as nickname, t2.point as point, t2.status as status FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as RNUM, T1.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM member WHERE status >= 1 ORDER BY member.point DESC )T1 WHERE ROWNUM <= 10 )T2 WHERE RNUM >= 1 )A CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) as totalCnt FROM member WHERE status >= 1 )B
